attributes.action: Camerons insult to soldiers friends and families.
attributes.additional_details:
This is part of a comment Cameron made about the loss of lifes in Afganistan.
"reminder of the huge price that we are paying for the work we are doing in Afghanistan"
I find this an insult and would like to know what huge price Cameron is paying?Cameron has never been on any front line in any war that he continues to send people to die in.Can Cameron explain the "WE" in his statement?Its an insult to every mother,friend and family member of the sevice men/women.
